name: Magnetizers
description:
Description:

This game was made in a week for the Yogscast Game Jam 2021 and the theme was "opposites". The mechanics are based around magnetic fields which affect your gravity and abilities, making them opposites of each other.

How to play:

You are a small robot in a mission to recover all the floppy disks lost around the lab. Use them to unlock the doors and reach the next room. But be careful! The alarms were set off, and there's traps all over the place!

Controls:
  • Menu selection: Arrows and Enter
  • Player movement: A and D
  • Jump: Space
  • Interact: E
  • Ability: Q
  • Back to menu: Esc

The Toasterbit team really hopes you have as much fun playing this game as we had while making it. Feel free to leave some feedback with your thoughts about our game, or let us know if you find any bugs. We'd really appreciate it. Thanks for playing!

-Toasterbit Studio.
